text: First Edition is a 1977 American short documentary film about the Baltimore Sun directed by Helen Whitney. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *, posted by the Baltimore Sun * Category:1977 films Category:1977 documentary films Category:1977 short films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films
title: First Edition (film)
